Title: Show $1/(1+ x^2)$ is uniformly continuous on $\Bbb R$.
AcceptedAnswer: You are nearly finishing the proof. $$|x - a| (\frac{|x|}{(1 + x^2)(1 + a^2)} + \frac{|a|}{(1 + x^2)(1 + a^2)})\le |x - a| (\frac{1}{2(1 + a^2)} + \frac{1}{2(1 + x^2)})\le |x-a|$$ Take $\delta=\epsilon$.
